DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy safety HA IDF II plus ( lidocaine ) inject nasolabial fold compare HA IDF II ( without lidocaine ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety HA IDF II Plus Versus HA IDF II Nasolabial Fold Injection
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 30 60 2 . Those whose wrinkle treatment area ( nasolabial fold ) correspond Stage 3 4 5stage Wrinkle Severity Rating Scale ( WSRS ) symmetrically 3 . Those informed purpose , method , effect etc . study sign informed consent form 4 . Those fell follow 3 case : 1 . Surgically sterile woman 2 . Women menopause 2 year last menstruation , age least 45 3 . Among woman meet neither b , agree use least 2 contraception method specify ( one barrier method must include ) 14 day last treatment investigational device Barrier method : Condom , diaphragm , cervical cap ( pessary ) , spermicide Hormonal method : Pills , injection ( depot ) , skin patch , hormonal implant ( Implanon ) , vaginal ring Intrauterine device ( IUDs ) : Cooper IUD ( Loop ) , hormonal IUD ( Mirena ) Natural method : Basic body temperature , ovulation period , coitus interruptus , abstinent 1 . Those skin disease ( skin infection , eczema , psoriasis , rosacea , herpes etc . ) low 2/3 part face wrinkle evaluation may affect 2 . Patients malignant tumor recognize medically important consider potentially affect clinical study 3 . Women pregnancy lactation 4 . Those bilirubin level exceed 1.5 time upper limit normal ALT/AST level exceed 2.5 time upper limit normal 5 . Those confirmed infection syphilis HIV 6 . Those anticoagulant therapy antiplatelet therapy within 2 week prior Visit 1 ( screen ) 7 .
